name: Line Connect
description:
Sharpen your mind with this simple yet addictive line puzzle game! Drag and connect the lines to create the shape as shown above. But watch out, lines can’t be overlapped!

Line Connect Features:
- Training and improving your logical thinking with thousands of levels
- Normal mode and Mirror mode
- Stunning colorful graphics
- Suitable for all ages
- Free to play without any in-app purchases
- NO WIFI? No problem! Play it anywhere anytime
